title: Monitor Pipeline Cathodic Protection
description: A corrosion engineer checks data from a pipeline's cathodic protection (CP) system to ensure it is effectively preventing corrosion.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest pipe-to-soil potential readings from the CP test points along pipeline segment PL-451.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of recent voltage readings is retrieved from the monitoring system.

tasks.description: Analyze the readings to ensure they meet the regulatory criteria for protection (e.g., more negative than -850 mV).
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows one test point reading is below the required threshold.

tasks.description: Create a work order for a technician to visit the low-reading test point and troubleshoot the CP rectifier.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is generated to investigate and repair the CP system.
